verses.verse: Make haste <WH430>, O God, to deliver <WH5337> me <WH2363>; make haste to help <WH5833> me <WH3068>, O Lord.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH2659> that seek <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315>: let them be turned <WH5472> backward <WH268>, and put to confusion <WH3637>, that desire <WH2655> my hurt <WH7451>.
Let them be turned back <WH7725> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say <WH559>, Aha <WH1889>, aha <WH1889>.

Let all those that seek <WH1245> you rejoice <WH7797> and be glad <WH8055> in you <WH157>: and let such as love your salvation <WH3444> say <WH559> continually <WH8548>, Let God <WH430> be magnified <WH1431>.
But I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>: make haste <WH2363> unto me <WH430>, O God: you are my help <WH5828> and my deliverer <WH6403>; O Lord <WH3068>, make no tarrying <WH309>.
